normalised: I am always asked about the best way to ensure smooth online transactions in India. Well, let me tell you about my own experience with Flipkart during the Big Billion Days sale on tenth October two thousand and twenty three. I was eyeing a new Samsung phone, the S twenty three Ultra, which was listed at a sweet rupee eighty four thousand nine hundred and ninety nine after all discounts.

unnormalised: I diligently added it to my cart around 11:45 PM, knowing the sale was officially starting at midnight. I even had my SBI credit card details saved for a faster checkout. Naively, I thought I was prepared! At exactly 12:00 AM, I hit the 'Place Order' button.

unnormalised: And that's when the fun began. The Flipkart app showed a loading screen...and kept loading. unnormalised: The screen went white. Absolutely blank. I refreshed. Nothing. I checked my bank account online. Rs. 84999 had been debited! But Flipkart showed no order confirmation. Panic set in.
